originalTitle: Migrant boat capsizes off Libya leaving 53 dead
title: Migrant boat capsizes off Libya leaving 53 dead
content: The IOM says that almost 500 people have been reported dead or missing off Libya so far this year.

originalTitle: How off-the-shelf drones are changing jihadist warfare in West Africa
title: How off-the-shelf drones are changing jihadist warfare in West Africa
content: Insurgents have carried out a wave of drone strikes on military positions in the region.

originalTitle: Senegal arrests 14 members of alleged paedophile gang linked to France
title: Senegal arrests 14 members of alleged paedophile gang linked to France
content: Police say the "transnational" criminal group has been in operation since 2017.

originalTitle: Is Portugal shifting to the right?
title: Is Portugal shifting to the right?
content: Centre-left socialist president is elected, but far-right rival secures record share of the vote.

originalTitle: Deadly drone attacks on civilians continue in Sudan’s Kordofan, UN says
title: Deadly drone attacks on civilians continue in Sudan’s Kordofan, UN says
content: United Nations human rights chief also decries 'preventable human rights catastrophe' in Sudan's el-Fasher.

originalTitle: UN installs relief housing units for displaced families in Gaza
title: UN installs relief housing units for displaced families in Gaza
content: The United Nations has installed the first batch of relief housing units for displaced Palestinians in Gaza City.

originalTitle: Hong Kong court jails media tycoon and British citizen Jimmy Lai for 20 years
title: Hong Kong court jails media tycoon and British citizen Jimmy Lai for 20 years
content: Lai's supporters say this amounts to a death sentence, but authorities say it demonstrates the rule of law.

originalTitle: Maxwell refuses to answer questions about Epstein in congressional hearing
title: Maxwell refuses to answer questions about Epstein in congressional hearing
content: Ghislaine Maxwell, the jailed associate of sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, invoked her Fifth Amendment right to avoid self-incrimination.

originalTitle: Epstein survivors call for full release of files in video
title: Epstein survivors call for full release of files in video
content: Millions of files relating to the late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein have been released by the DOJ but many have redactions.

originalTitle: 'Didn't want the season to end like this' - Grealish has surgery
title: 'Didn't want the season to end like this' - Grealish has surgery
content: Jack Grealish says he "didn't want the season to end like this" after confirming he has had surgery on a foot stress fracture.

originalTitle: Late goals are destroying Liverpool's season and solution isn't obvious
title: Late goals are destroying Liverpool's season and solution isn't obvious
content: Why have Liverpool gone from mentality monsters to a side there for the taking?

originalTitle: Watford appoint Edward Still as head coach
title: Watford appoint Edward Still as head coach
content: Watford appoint Edward Still as head coach following the resignation of Javi Gracia after only three months in charge.
